casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 57A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. Maureen D. Murray, Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Hospital. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diana E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of July 2006 by Respondents to Dismiss Petitioners' Appeal as Moot:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of November 2006."
